result.markdown:
# Administrative maps of Japan

-   Load all necessary packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
```
:::


- Load the `shapefile` of Japan's administrative divisions


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="false"}
jp0_shp <- st_read("data/shapefile/jp_adm0_shp/jpn_admbnda_adm0_2019.shp")
jp1_shp <- st_read("data/shapefile/jp_adm1_shp/jpn_admbnda_adm1_2019.shp") 
jp2_shp <- st_read("data/shapefile/jp_adm2_shp/jpn_admbnda_adm2_2019.shp") 
```
:::

-   Observe the data inside the shape file of `adm0`


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="false"}
jp0_shp # for admin level 0
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Simple feature collection with 1 feature and 3 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 122.9349 ymin: 24.04582 xmax: 153.9819 ymax: 45.55571
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
  ADM0_EN ADM0_JA ADM0_PCODE                       geometry
1   Japan    日本         JP MULTIPOLYGON (((123.8028 24...
```

:::
:::


-   Check the geographic coordinate system of your `adm0` shapefile


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="false"}
st_crs(jp0_shp) # for admin level 0
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Coordinate Reference System:
  User input: WGS 84 
  wkt:
GEOGCRS["WGS 84",
    DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984",
        ELLIPSOID["WGS 84",6378137,298.257223563,
            LENGTHUNIT["metre",1]]],
    PRIMEM["Greenwich",0,
        ANGLEUNIT["degree",0.0174532925199433]],
    CS[ellipsoidal,2],
        AXIS["latitude",north,
            ORDER[1],
            ANGLEUNIT["degree",0.0174532925199433]],
        AXIS["longitude",east,
            ORDER[2],
            ANGLEUNIT["degree",0.0174532925199433]],
    ID["EPSG",4326]]
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="false"}
st_crs(jp1_shp) # for admin level 1
```

```

  User input: WGS 84

        AXIS["longitude",east,

    ID["EPSG",4326]]
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="false"}
st_crs(jp2_shp) # for admin level 2
```


:::
:::


-   Plot the map of Japan admin 0


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="false"}
ggplot(jp0_shp) +
  geom_sf()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](lecture_11_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


- Plot the map of Japan admin 1


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="false"}
ggplot(jp1_shp) +
  geom_sf()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](lecture_11_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


- Plot the map of Japan admin 2


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="false"}
ggplot(jp2_shp) +
  geom_sf()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](lecture_11_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
